rows.label: qev041303_MSG0001
rows.name:
Recently I was trading Miralife Cards, and and and the
other party offered me animal bones as his half of the
trade. Which is...weird, isn't it?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041303_MSG0002
rows.name:
I mean, that doesn't make sense, right?
Since cards and bones are entirely different things?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041303_MSG0003
rows.name: Hmm? You want to trade Miralife Cards?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041303_MSG0004
rows.name:
I'm so so sorry, but I don't have any spares to trade
right now. You understand, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041303_MSG0005
rows.name:
Do you know about Miralife Cards?
They're a fad that's sweeping New LA by by storm.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041303_MSG0006
rows.name:
The cards are very well-made, and almost all that we
Ma-non can focus on right now. Some of us are are
even going bankrupt buying them. ...That's bad, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041303_MSG0008
rows.name:
...And you're trying to trade your way up to to get a
rare gold nopopotamus card?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041303_MSG0009
rows.name: That's wonderful! Maybe I could help out?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041303_MSG0010
rows.name:
Well, I suppose I could swap this bronze petramand
card for your bronze blatta, if you like?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041303_MSG0011
rows.name:
Okay, it's all yours, I guess. Good luck turning it into
that gold nopopotamus card. That seems so so hard,
but I guess we'll see, won't we?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041303_MSG0012
rows.name:
Oh! That's okay. But if you ever change your mind,
maybe let me know?[ST:wait ]
